pkgmetadata.longdescription: Maximum Projection Designs // Generate a maximum projection (MaxPro) design, a MaxPro Latin hypercube design or improve an initial design based on the MaxPro criterion. Details of the MaxPro criterion can be found in: Joseph, V. R., Gul, E., and Ba, S. (2015) "Maximum Projection Designs for Computer Experiments", Biometrika.
